venue.name: Morse Recital Hall in Sprague Memorial Hall

item.description:
Please join me for a free Sunday afternoon concert. Let's be moved by violinist Wendy Sharp,and Pianist Julie Nishimura as they perform works by Stravinsky,Higdon and Mozart. The concert is part of the yale faculty artist series and is held in the beautiful Morse Recital Hall ( part of Sprague Hall) located on the corner of College and Wall street (The main entrance faces College Street.)

Since this is a free concert, there are no tickets needed but early arrival is advised to assure seating. The concert will start promptly at 4pm.

This is a great way to enjoy the talents of our local community... Hope to see you there.


In the spirit of Thanksgiving, I will be accepting donations of non-perishable items to benefit families in need..

For directions and parking information please visit: http://music.yale.edu...

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Music to Nourish the Soul....
